titleStmt.title: A proclamation, reviving the laws anent hunting, hawking, fishing and appointing masters of the game.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to his most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the ninth day of June, one thousand six hundred eighty years. And of Our Reign the thirty two year.
Signed: Al. Gibson, Cl. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
